channel.title: 3 Errors... Cant figure it out
channel.description:
[b]This was to add the transparent upper right-hand box in the corner to show the server name and version and things.[/b]
Copy of client.java:58: class client is public, should be declared in a file nam ed client.java public class client extends Player implements Runnable { ^ client.java:112: cannot find symbol symbol : variable serverLatency location: class PlayerHandler sendQuest("Server Ping: @gre@"+PlayerHandler.serverLatency, 15897); ^ client.java:113: cannot find symbol symbol : variable latency location: class client sendQuest("Player Ping: @gre@"+latency, 15898); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 3 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .
[b]There was already a writePlayers void so I deleted it (it had my server name and players and all that good stuff already at the top middle of my screen) and replaced it with that code...[/b]

item.title: 3 Errors... Cant figure it out
item.dc:creator: @bmxr4c3r709 bmxr4c3r709
item.description:
@bmxr4c3r709 wrote:

Change the name of ‘Copy of client.java’ to client.java and for the third one, delete the space before @gre@? And the second one maybe make the ‘P’ a ‘p’

Read full topic

item.title: 3 Errors... Cant figure it out
item.dc:creator: @Maskmanator Maskmanator
item.description:
@Maskmanator wrote:

This was to add the transparent upper right-hand box in the corner to show the server name and version and things.

Copy of client.java:58: class client is public, should be declared in a file nam
ed client.java
public class client extends Player implements Runnable {
^
client.java:112: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable serverLatency
location: class PlayerHandler
sendQuest(“Server Ping: @gre@”+PlayerHandler.serverLatency, 15897);
^
client.java:113: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable latency
location: class client
sendQuest(“Player Ping: @gre@”+latency, 15898);
^
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
3 errors
Files Compiled Successfully!
Press any key to continue . . .

There was already a writePlayers void so I deleted it (it had my server name and players and all that good stuff already at the top middle of my screen) and replaced it with that code…
